title: Body Of Student Killed In Ukraine Reaches Karnataka, Chief Minister Pays Respect - NDTV
content:
1. Body Of Student Killed In Ukraine Reaches Karnataka, Chief Minister Pays Respect  NDTV
  2. Family of Indian student killed in Ukraine to donate his body to medical college  The Indian Express
  3. Mortal Remains Of Indian Student Killed In Ukraine To Arrive In Bengaluru At 3 AM On Monday  India Today
  4. Mortal remains of Karnataka student killed in Ukraine arrives in Bengaluru; CM pays homage  Daijiworld.com
  5. Body Of Indian Student Killed In Ukraine Reaches Bengaluru  NDTV
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The body of Indian student Naveen Shekarappa Gyanagoudar, who was killed in shelling in Ukraine's Kharkiv on March 1 amidst the ongoing Russia-Ukraine war, arrived at Bengaluru airport here on Monday.
